1.title: Full-Stack Software Engineer
1.role_description:
• Worked on many high-profile websites for major theatre and media companies, including sites built for Green The Uk and some of the most popular theatre productions in London’s West End.
  • Successfully met many tight deadlines with very limited timeframes.
  • Extensive use of CSS, Bootstrap 3, 4 and 5, PHP, jQuery and git management through BitBucket. I also worked with SQL databases, AWS and Laravel Forge and on legacy sites hosted using FTP.
  • Rapidly built static sites in a few hours and turned them into dynamically generated sites with an integrated CMS once clients approved the initial result
  • Built CMS for clients with Laravel and trained them in how to update their web content once project was complete

2.title: Software Engineering Bootcamp
2.role_description:
• Test - Driven Development(TDD RSpec)
  • Pair programming and Agile development
  • Technologies such as JavaScript, Ruby, Ruby on Rails, React Native, Sinatra, jQuery,HTML, CSS, and API
  • Testing Frameworks: RSpec, Capybara, Jasmine
  • Databases: PostgreSQL
  • Deployment: Heroku, Travis, CircleCI
  • Version Control: Github

3.title: Front End Developer
3.role_description:
• Developed Barometer 2020 – an online version of EI’s annual report using JavaScript & Bootstrap.
  • Knowledge Hub – developed Hydrogen Guide for the information services using jQuery, HTML, and CSS.
  • Debugged, updated, built responsive pages and cross-browser compatibility. E.g., Hearts & Minds and Tripod.
  • SEO optimization and accessibility audit across EI’ s online services using Google Lighthouse.
  • Represented the Digital Team in company meetings to provide updates on project status.
  • Provided training and support for colleagues working within the online production processes.
  • Provided technical support for stakeholder enquiries.
